   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to collective.jqueryflot's documentation
================================================

:Date: |today|
:Version: |version|
:Release: |release|

:Code repository: https://svn.plone.org/svn/collective/collective.jqueryflot/
:Questions and comments: rok@garbas.si

Flot is a pure Javascript plotting library for jQuery. It produces graphical plots of arbitrary datasets on-the-fly client-side. 

collective.jqueryflot is Plone's implementation.

Enjoy!

=================

    :maxdepth: 3

    usage
    flot/index
    screenshots
